panel.ontrigger: SetVisible(param); If(_curability gt _abilitystart + 2, SetVisible(false)); If(_curability lt _abilitystart, SetVisible(false)); If(param, Set(_curability, _curability + 1));

panel.name: inventory_panel_{slot}
inventory_panel_{slot}

panel.label: Choose A Unit From The Left

label.ontrigger: SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(Ceil(param)); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));
SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(FtoA(param, 2)); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));
SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(Ceil(param)); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));
SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(FtoA(param, 2)); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));

SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(FtoA(param, 1)); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));
SetVisible(param != 0); SetText(FtoP(param, 1) # '%'); If(param lt 0, SetColor('#FF0000'), SetColor('#00FF00'));

panel.label: ^rNOTE: ^wYou can press the "^gY^w" key at any time to view a description of your abilities

panel.ontrigger: If(!StringEquals(_lastentity, param), Split(Set(_curability, 0), Set(_abilitystart, 0), Set(_lastentity, param), RefreshInterface()));

panel.name: report_widget
panel.label: Is there something wrong with your Savage 2 experience? Please tell us below:

instance.name: round_button2
instance.label: Report
instance.onclick: Set(report_reason, StripChar(' ', report_reason)); Set(report_reason, StripChar('&', report_reason)); Set(report_reason, StripChar('/', report_reason)); httpgetfile('http://188.40.92.72/brogor/report_match.php?action=reportGame&matchid='#Entity_NpcController_Description#'&time='#cg_gameTime#'&reporter='#Name#'&reason='#report_reason#'&spamtest=nospamplease', '/tmp/doesntmatter'); HideWidget('report_widget');

label.name: loadout_timer
label.ontrigger: SetText('Wait to Spawn for: ' # param # ' sec');

label.name: loadout_timer
label.ontrigger: SetText('Wait to Spawn for: ' # param # ' sec');

frame.name: loadout_item_tooltip
frame.label: Cripple (^291P^*)
Prerequisite:
Building
Cost:
The ability to slow the movement speed of an enemy unit by 30% for 15 seconds.

instance.name: player_stat2
instance.desc: After surviving many trials and tribulations, it becomes natural to ignore pain and fatigue, increasing your health and health regeneration.

instance.name: player_stat2
instance.desc: With every battle comes the knowledge to increase your mana, mana regeneration and predict your opponent's moves, reducing the damage and duration of harmful spells and skills.

instance.name: player_stat2
instance.desc: With proper training, any being can be taught to make every motion easier and more effective. This training increases your stamina and stamina regeneration.

instance.name: player_stat2
instance.desc: Even the hardiest warrior will fall without his weapon, and those that realize that train to improve their strength, improving their melee damage.

panel.label: Spawn Queue
Your team has too many players!

label.ontrigger3: SetText('You are currently ^090' # _spawn_queue_pos # ' of ' # _spawn_queue_size # '^* players waiting to spawn in the queue. You will be able to spawn when enough players on your team are dead.');

panel.label: The spawn queue maintains an even player count between teams when they become unbalanced. Rather than forcing players to join the other team against their will, the spawn queue balances the game while giving players the option to switch teams.
If you do not wish to wait simply click the switch teams button. ^090Doing so grants bonus experience and an automatic win!
You have Attribute Points to spend!

You have Leveled UP. When you level up you gain Attribute Points which you can spend on various attributes such as health pool, health regen, damage, armor etc. You have unspent points would you like to spend them now?
